title: Jaycoinz
author: Jaycoinz
content: Bitcoin as we know is cryptocurrency which rise and fall in the digital crypto market. Bitcoin has a trend over other cryptocurrency in the sense that Bitcoin is the leading cryptocurrency in the world digital crypto market. Over the year we find out that those in invested in Bitcoin benefits greatly  which make a lot of investors to key into cryptocurrency. But despite that Bitcoin diminish but that doesn't mean it the end of Bitcoin. Recently Bitcoin has been tend to high value on like others cryptocurrency that remains or increase in a little bit. So I urge every one that now is the best to buy Bitcoin as it trend to increase in no distance time.

comments.author: Mustang Shelby
comments.body: Bitcoin will go through an important phase.  After the halving, the rewards will be reduced by half.  I think the price of Bitcoin is high after each halving.  Although there is still a long time for this halving, I expect it to be priced long before the halving.  Whether or not to buy Bitcoin is a decision that everyone will make of their own free will.  Still, in my opinion, in the changing world, every individual should have a personal wallet and some bitcoin.

comments.author: romero121
comments.body: Bitcoin is the name that have paved path for the rest of the cryptocurrencies available in the market. Bitcoin being the lead its market movements were followed by the rest of the cryptocurrencies. The proven growth is another reason why this is being believed as well as given importance for investments. In the short duration we've encountered big number of cryptocurrencies losing its value after reaching great heights. Bitcoin have been moving on its path without carrying any external pressure on it. The market have now begun to run close to the traditional market which makes it more strong.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Quote from: Jaycoinz on January 12, 2023, 01:31:25 PMSo I urge every one that now is the best to buy Bitcoin as it trend to increase in no distance time.The best moment to purchase bitcoin was last year, when prices were even cheaper. Now it's good too, but not the best moment, though. Anyway, it's still not too late. Everyone can still buy bitcoin and prepare themselves for the pump season that can happen this year or in the upcoming years. The market is looking better each new day and it would be great if it continued like this, but investors must be careful, because we are talking about a tendency that has started few days ago. It can be a bull trap, so beware, and don't expect immediat returns from your new investments.

comments.author: Welsh
comments.body: Quote from: romero121 on January 12, 2023, 09:21:21 PMBitcoin is the name that have paved path for the rest of the cryptocurrencies available in the market. Bitcoin being the lead its market movements were followed by the rest of the cryptocurrencies. The proven growth is another reason why this is being believed as well as given importance for investments. In the short duration we've encountered big number of cryptocurrencies losing its value after reaching great heights. Bitcoin have been moving on its path without carrying any external pressure on it. The market have now begun to run close to the traditional market which makes it more strong. Bitcoin only paved the way because it's features are actually beneficial. Most other altcoins don't have anything meaningful to add, and are simply changed parameters to give the impression they're something new. There are a few that have offered different things, which could be beneficial. However, not to the extent of Bitcoin. The biggest benefit is not needing to use a bank, and therefore truly owning your money, but we don't need hundreds of other altcoins to do the same thing, we just need one. However, Bitcoin has had a ton of external pressure so I'm not sure what you mean by that. It's basically been scrutinized, and predicted into the ground at least several times every quarter.

comments.author: glendall
comments.body: The bitcoin price cycle is very interesting. the benefits also vary greatly for the people who hold it. actually the right time to buy bitcoin was last year because now we can see the price of bitcoin has started to rise. but there's nothing wrong with buying back even though the profit level will be different from those who bought last year

comments.body: Quote from: Solokan on January 12, 2023, 11:16:14 PMyes, now is a good time to buy bitcoins. but in buying don't be in a hurry because now the price is increasing, so wait for a correction when buy.Waiting another time could be disastrous. comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on January 13, 2023, 07:59:21 AMor maybe just accept the fact that 99% of us can't really time markets and a better strategy would simply to just do dollar-cost averaging.https://dcabtc.com/Dollar Cost Averaging is helpful to average our entry price and reduce or perfectly get rid of psychological effects on our decisions. comments.body: As others have mentioned, Bitcoin is just known to be the first cryptocurrency and also for having the largest community and value over other cryptocurrencies.
